response.body: { "id": 999, "client_id": {{jsonPath request.body '$.client_id'}}, "professional_id": {{jsonPath request.body '$.professional_id'}}, "service_id": {{jsonPath request.body '$.service_id'}}, "start_at": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.start_at'}}", "end_at": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.end_at'}}", "status": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.status'}}", "observacoes": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.observacoes'}}" }
